sections.MISSION:
2/B conducts Obstacle Course IVO Camp Aachen on 180930AUG2022 in order to provide build unit cohesion and Soldier movement proficiency.
Leader’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this event is to test Soldier’s ability to maneuver over complex obstacles and test general fitness.
sections.EXECUTION:
of obstacles.
Each obstacle has appropriate range Safeties.
PLT Medic present at all times
sections.END STATE:
/Training Outcomes:
All Soldiers safely and successfully execute the Obstacle Course
Concept of the Operation: 2/B SPs via Stryker to the Obstacle Course NLT 0845. CASEVAC vehicle is established and Soldiers receive a safety brief. The Platoons will break down into fire teams and begin movement for obstacle instruction. Each Team will execute the obstacle while teams waiting provide safeties for the obstacle. After each team from the Platoon has executed the obstacle, the Platoon will move to the next obstacle. The PLT medic will remain with the Platoon at all times.
Following orientation, the Trainees will break down into 2-man buddy teams and execute the O-Course for time. Scores will be recorded at the end of the course
If time permits, each Soldier will run the O-Course individually for time. Winners will have their score recorded at the end of the run.
Resourcing
Troops to Task/ Bull Resources
OIC LT Dunn
RSO SGT Daum
Lane Safeties (2 SMs on confidence climb, tough one, slide for life, and wall hangar from team not executing)
Land: Reserved
Transportation: 2/B TRP Strykers for backside support PLT Transportation
Medic: Platoon Medic, Driver, and CASEVAC vehicle
CBRN Chamber
8x lanes
MVMNT RT
100 m
150 m
